item.title: Template page
item.description: Architecture --- config: theme: 'dark' themeVariables: darkMode: true background: '#222222' mainBkg: '#222222' primaryColor: '#222222' primaryTextColor: '#FFFFFF' primaryBorderColor: '#32C5D2' secondaryColor: '#7FB6ED' secondaryBorderColor: '#7FB6ED' lineColor: '#666666' textColor: '#FFFFFF' noteBkgColor: '#222222' noteTextColor: '#F57F6C' noteBorderColor: '#666666' activationBkgColor: '#F57F6C' activationBorderColor: '#FCB5AA' signalColor: '#32C5D2' fontFamily: 'JetBrains Mono' fontSize: '14px' --- sequenceDiagram Alice ->> Bob: Hello Bob, how are you? Bob-->>John: How about you John? Bob--x Alice: I am good thanks! Bob-x John: I am good thanks!
